00031 atomic_t FileBlockCache::ms_next_file_id = ATOMIC_INIT(0);

00033 FileBlockCache::~FileBlockCache() {
00034   for (BlockCache::const_iterator iter = m_cache.begin();
00035        iter != m_cache.end(); ++iter)
00036     delete [] (*iter).block;
00037 }

00039 bool
00040 FileBlockCache::checkout(int file_id, uint32_t file_offset, uint8_t **blockp,
00041                          uint32_t *lengthp) {
00042   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00043   HashIndex &hash_index = m_cache.get<1>();
00044   HashIndex::iterator iter;
00045   uint64_t key = ((uint64_t)file_id << 32) | file_offset;
00046 
00047   if ((iter = hash_index.find(key)) == hash_index.end())
00048     return false;
00049 
00050   BlockCacheEntry entry = *iter;
00051   entry.ref_count++;
00052 
00053   hash_index.erase(iter);
00054 
00055   pair<Sequence::iterator, bool> insert_result = m_cache.push_back(entry);
00056   assert(insert_result.second);
00057 
00058   *blockp = (*insert_result.first).block;
00059   *lengthp = (*insert_result.first).length;
00060 
00061   return true;
00062 }

00065 void FileBlockCache::checkin(int file_id, uint32_t file_offset) {
00066   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00067   HashIndex &hash_index = m_cache.get<1>();
00068   HashIndex::iterator iter;
00069   uint64_t key = ((uint64_t)file_id << 32) | file_offset;
00070 
00071   iter = hash_index.find(key);
00072 
00073   assert(iter != hash_index.end() && (*iter).ref_count > 0);
00074 
00075   hash_index.modify(iter, DecrementRefCount());
00076 }

00079 bool
00080 FileBlockCache::insert_and_checkout(int file_id, uint32_t file_offset,
00081                                     uint8_t *block, uint32_t length) {
00082   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00083   HashIndex &hash_index = m_cache.get<1>();
00084   uint64_t key = ((uint64_t)file_id << 32) | file_offset;
00085 
00086   if (length > m_max_memory || hash_index.find(key) != hash_index.end())
00087     return false;
00088 
00089   // make room
00090   if (m_avail_memory < length) {
00091     BlockCache::iterator iter = m_cache.begin();
00092     while (iter != m_cache.end()) {
00093       if ((*iter).ref_count == 0) {
00094         m_avail_memory += (*iter).length;
00095         delete [] (*iter).block;
00096         iter = m_cache.erase(iter);
00097         if (m_avail_memory >= length)
00098           break;
00099       }
00100       else
00101         ++iter;
00102     }
00103   }
00104 
00105   if (m_avail_memory < length)
00106     return false;
00107 
00108   BlockCacheEntry entry(file_id, file_offset);
00109   entry.block = block;
00110   entry.length = length;
00111   entry.ref_count = 1;
00112 
00113   pair<Sequence::iterator, bool> insert_result = m_cache.push_back(entry);
00114   assert(insert_result.second);
00115 
00116   m_avail_memory -= length;
00117 
00118   return true;
00119 }

00122 bool FileBlockCache::contains(int file_id, uint32_t file_offset) {
00123   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00124   HashIndex &hash_index = m_cache.get<1>();
00125   uint64_t key = ((uint64_t)file_id << 32) | file_offset;
00126 
00127   return (hash_index.find(key) != hash_index.end());
00128 }
